author: matzew
msg: little fix in util (caused by cp)

author: chirino
msg: Fix for MySQL DB tables should be INNODB based for proper tx support: https://issues.apache.org/activemq/browse/AMQ-1891

author: gkossakowski
msg: Move BlockResourcesHolder interface to cocoon-block-deployment module.
Added default implementation of this interface and at the same time deprecated it in favour of new interface with appropriate package name.

author: gkossakowski
msg: There is no need for lazy initialisation any more because JNet handlers are correctly installed for init() method, see COCOON-2236.

author: gkossakowski
msg: ServletFactoryBean will install JNet handlers before calling init() method
of Servlet that is being created. This should make SSF compatible with Cocoon Core 2.2.0 again.
